page.title: 15MORE GAMES,WITHERNSEA
page.content: In Queenie,Queenie one person,with his back to the rest of the players, throws a ball over his shoulder.It is caught or picked up by one of the players,who hides it behind his back. The players say the rhyme 'Queenie, Queenie, who's got the ball;is he fat or is he tall ?'The person with his back to the players now turns and has to guess who has the ball.If he is right he stays as front person, otherwise the person with the ball takes over. In Block you have a base where one player counts to 50 while the others hide.The counter has to find the others but when he sees one he has to run back to base and count 1,2,3, also saying the name of the person seen. If this person gets back to base before the finder then the finder has to count again from the beginning.
